Pre-Game Insights: India has conceded just one goal against Qatar in their last two matches.
Both India and Qatar are level on points in Group A (3).
Miscellaneous Highlights: India registered a stunning draw against Qatar in 2019 and will aim to replicate the same.
The game will be played on November 21, 2023 at the Kalinga Stadium in Bhubaneswar.
The match will kick off at 7:00 PM IST.
Others: India are unbeaten on their home soil this year.
Qatar has made their first-ever trip to India and will want to make it a memorable one.
India's captain Sunil Chhetri is expected to play a crucial role.
